name: InstructionActStatus
title: InstructionActStatus
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set holds the state model concepts for an Obligation Instruction or Prohibition Instrucation. These are instructions that a patient, or a patient's healthcare agent or other type of surrogate decision-maker may decide to make when the patient is unable to communicate),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes completed and active),(Exclusion Criteria: )
